articles.title: Maryland wins $3.6M to address opioid abuse during pregnancy
articles.description: BALTIMORE, Md. (AP) — Maryland's Health Department has received $3.6 million in federal funding to address opioid use among pregnant and new mothers.
articles.content:
BALTIMORE, Md. (AP) Maryland's Health Department has received $3.6 million in federal funding to address opioid use among pregnant and new mothers.
The department launched the initiative, called the Maternal Opioid Model," this month, according to a statemen… [+707 chars]

articles.title: Eurozone inflation rate hits 6-month high of 1.3%
articles.description: BRUSSELS (AP) — Inflation across the 19-country eurozone spiked to a six-month high in December due to steady and widespread price increases, official figures showed Tuesday.
articles.content:
BRUSSELS (AP) Inflation across the 19-country eurozone spiked to a six-month high in December due to steady and widespread price increases, official figures showed Tuesday.
